entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023
